abstract: HSBC Holdings, the British banking company, said it planned to buy 73.2 percent of IL&FS Investsmart, an Indian brokerage firm, for 10.03 billion rupees ($235 million).
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings, the British banking company, said it planned to buy 73.2 percent of IL&FS Investsmart, an Indian brokerage firm, for 10.03 billion rupees ($235 million).

headline.main: HSBC to Buy Majority of Indian Brokerage
